basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/VMware%20vCenter/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution. The [VMware vCenter Server](https://www.vmware.com/products/vcenter-server.html) solution allows you ingest logs from your vCenter platform using Syslog into Microsoft Sentinel. **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: a. [Agent-based log collection (Syslog)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-syslog) **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 1, **Workbooks:** 1, **Analytic Rules:** 2 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This solution installs a data connector that helps ingest vCenter logs into Microsoft Sentinel using Syslog. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.
The solution installs a parser that transforms ingested data. The transformed logs can be accessed using the vcenter Kusto Function alias.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This solution installs workbook(s) to help you gain insights into the telemetry collected in Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, start using the workbook in Manage solution view.
This data connector depends on a parser based on Kusto Function **vCenter** to work as expected. [Follow steps to get this Kusto Function](https://aka.ms/sentinel-vCenter-parser)
This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.
Detects when root user login from uncommon IP address.
